=`ToString`=
{{{public override string ToString()}}}

Returns a C# string.
===Remarks===
This results a heap allocation.

===Example=== 
{{{
public virtual void Map(ByteSlice line, MapOutput output)
{
    mstring ms = mstring.Prepare(line);
    Qizmt_Log(ms.ToString());
} 
}}}
